statements: SELECT recipe_name, chef_name FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT instructions, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE chef_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Lasagna%'
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE chef_name = 'Alice Smith'
SELECT chef_name, recipe_name FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id > 3
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY chef_name DESC, recipe_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name FROM recipes WHERE chef_name = 'Alice' OR chef_name = 'Bob';
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, LENGTH(instructions) AS instruction_length FROM recipes WHERE LENGTH(instructions) > 100 ORDER BY instruction_length DESC;
SELECT chef_name, COUNT(*) AS recipe_count FROM recipes GROUP BY chef_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT chef_name, AVG(LENGTH(instructions)) AS avg_instruction_length FROM recipes GROUP BY chef_name ORDER BY avg_instruction_length DESC;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cooking_time, chef_name FROM recipes;
SELECT chef_name, recipe_name, cooking_time, recipe_id FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, cooking_time FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time < 30;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredient_name, quantity, unit_of_measure FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time > 30;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, cooking_time FROM recipes ORDER BY cooking_time ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, SUM(cooking_time) AS total_cooking_time FROM recipes GROUP BY chef_name;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit_of_measure FROM ingredients WHERE quantity >= 2;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes;
SELECT chef_name, preparation_time_minutes FROM recipes WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT ingredient_name, unit_of_measurement FROM ingredients WHERE unit_of_measurement IN ('teaspoon', 'tablespoon');
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, cuisine_type, preparation_time_minutes FROM recipes;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT recipe_name, instruction_text FROM recipes JOIN cooking_instructions ON recipes.recipe_id = cooking_instructions.recipe_id;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE chef_name = 'Jamie Oliver';
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, cuisine_type, preparation_time_minutes FROM recipes ORDER BY preparation_time_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes ORDER BY chef_name ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes WHERE course_type = 'Dessert';
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT chef_name, expertise FROM chefs WHERE expertise LIKE '%Italian%';
SELECT instruction_text FROM cooking_instructions WHERE recipe_id = 3 ORDER BY step_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE course_type = 'Main Course';
SELECT recipe_name, chef_name, cuisine_type FROM recipes ORDER BY chef_name DESC;
SELECT chef_name, AVG(recipe_id) FROM recipes GROUP BY chef_name;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY ingredient_id ASC;
SELECT chef_name, expertise FROM chefs WHERE chef_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, servings, prep_time, cook_time FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE servings > 4;
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM ingredients WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, servings, prep_time, cook_time FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE servings > 4;

SELECT recipe_name, ingredients.ingredient_name, quantity, unit FROM recipes JOIN recipes_ingredients ON recipes.recipe_id = recipes_ingredients.recipe_id JOIN ingredients ON recipes_ingredients.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT recipe_name, category_name FROM recipes JOIN recipe_categories ON recipes.recipe_id = recipe_categories.recipe_id JOIN categories ON recipe_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
